attributes.action: Calls for reducing or cancelling accommodation fees due to COVID-19 pandemic
attributes.background:
1.The government should call for changing or cancelling university accommodation contracts, especially for overseas students.
2.Accommodation agencies should have more flexible policies about contracts during the pandemic time.
3.Accommodation agencies should give more explanations about terms.

rejection.details:
Fees for student accommodation are a matter for individual landlords, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
